radiographic_examinations.findings: Column of clustered stones measuring up to 1.0 cm in the distal left ureter (steinstrasse), with mild-to-moderate left hydroureteronephrosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval resolution of the previously noted left hydroureteronephrosis and distal left ureteral stones.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic steatosis, mild infiltration about the pancreatic head, and inflammatory changes including wall thickening with intramural edema in the duodenum. Spleen is mildly enlarged measuring up to 16 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: These findings appear new since the very recent prior study even allowing for differences in modality.
